original_text: Then he rode along the road to find God's servant. He found him as he was sitting under an oak tree. The old prophet asked him, ‘Are you the servant of God from Judah?’ He answered, ‘I am.’
korean_text: 하나님의 사람을 뒤따라가서 상수리나무 아래에 앉은 것을 보고 이르되 그대가 유다에서 온 하나님의 사람이냐 대답하되 그러하다

sentences.original_text: Then he rode along the road
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 길을 따라 말을 타고 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: as he was sitting under an oak tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 상수리나무 아래 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: Are you the servant of God from Judah
